cause.description:
LifeNets.net is a non-profit association which is owned and operated by its members. The self-proclaimed "Wikipedia of Activism" we long to break down the traditional barriers between non-profit contributers and internal decision makers. If you're tired of giving up your hard earned money to charitable organizations who only send you junk mail in return, this is the place for you.
Our Goal: Ending extreme poverty and genocide. We are dedicated to the proposition that all human beings share an equal right to life. Over half of the planet lives on less than 2 dollars a day and suffers from easily preventable diseases. Despite the enormous amount of suffering created by extreme poverty, and the demonstrable success of economic interventions, less than a penny for every hundred dollars of wealth in the United States is spent on foreign aid.
Submit your thoughts and concerns to our government leaders/representatives via LifeNets.com at:
http://www.lifenets.net/dev/?q=node/15&refid=198
Don't delay what you can do today!
